description:
It’s revealed that Haruto is a descendant from the bloodline, and J asks him to help him solve the mystery behind the numbers that appeared from Tenna’s bracelet. Haruto was conflicted between the fact that J was relying on him and the fact that if they were able to solve this mystery, J would probably disappear. Meawhile, Hayakawa was explaining to Akira why he and J were sent here from a hundred years ago at Café de Wayne. Suddenly, the two hear an unfamiliar voice, and it seems to be coming from P-chan...
Source: crunchyroll
